mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_data_blood_glucose ( bloodGlucoseID , associateID , measureTime , GLU , flag , upload , RES , creatTime , describtion , deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{bloodGlucoseID} , #{associateID} , #{measureTime} , #{gLU} , #{flag} , #{upload} , #{rES} , #{creatTime} , #{describtion} , #{deleteFlag} )
